title: LNPAGE
description: A full-stack web application that provides an interactive way to test algorithms such as Palindromes, Perfect Numbers, Fibonacci Sequence, and more. Built with React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, and Docker.

title: BrilexDz Product Showcase Platform
description: A React-based product showcase platform for Garden Clean MESTAR, featuring product filtering by categories such as disinfectants and insecticides. Built with Tailwind CSS and Context API for state management.

title: Enterprise POS Platform
description: A comprehensive Point-of-Sale management system serving over 10k daily users. Includes secure role and region-based access control, customizable dashboards, and data export options.
mission: Full-stack development, API design, dashboard UI

title: Smart SIM Allocation System
description: A high-performance SIM management platform with real-time updates, caching, and state synchronization. Integrated Elasticsearch for optimized queries and Docker/Kubernetes for scalability.

title: AI Identity Verification Platform
description: A scalable Nest.js backend integrating AI microservices for face detection, OCR, and NFC processing. Includes JWT-secured access, vector similarity search with Milvus, and a Next.js dashboard for monitoring.

title: Multi-Store E-commerce Management System
description: A Nest.js-based platform to manage multiple online stores with centralized product, order, and user data. Features Redis caching, Prisma ORM, and JWT-secured role-based access.

title: CodeFlow
description: A developer platform inspired by StackOverflow, allowing developers to ask and answer questions, browse jobs, and create accounts for a personalized experience. Built using TypeScript, Next.js, and Clerk authentication.

title: ðŸªŸ BOMARE - Windows Distribution Guide
description: A detailed build and distribution guide for creating Windows executables and installers using Node.js and Electron for the BOMARE Impedance Measurement System. Includes setup for building, packaging, troubleshooting, and code signing, ensuring a professional and user-friendly installation process.
mission: Back-end, Front-end, Build Automation, Distribution Engineering

title: Project Charik.fr Clone
description: A React-based recreation of the Charik website showcasing strong frontend development and responsive design skills using React, Tailwind, and Vite.

title: SummarizerBot
description: A React app that uses GPT-4 via RapidAPI to summarize articles from URLs. Users can easily extract key points and summaries using a modern, minimal UI.

title: PulsePricing
description: A responsive front-end clone of Pulseâ€™s pricing page built using HTML and CSS with minimal media queries for clean adaptability across devices.
